title: `requirements.txt` file added.
content: A `requirements.txt` file has been added to the root of the project. This file contains all the dependencies required to run the project. This file is used by the `pip` package manager to install all the dependencies.

title: Data IDs added.
content: Data IDs have been added to the project. These are used to map the phone numbers and email addresses with IDs.

title: Migrating from Flask-Login to Flask-JWT-Extended
content: Flask-Login has been replaced with Flask-JWT-Extended. This change has been made to improve the security of the application.

title: FastAPI Türkiye Tanışma Etkinliği
content: FastAPI Türkiye topluluğu olarak ilk tanışma etkinliğimizi 6 Haziran 2024 tarihinde gerçekleştiriyoruz. Etkinliğimize katılmak için [buraya](https://www.example.com/) tıklayabilirsiniz.
